snippet: Leon Wieseltier will share the Dan David Prize, which is given annually to honor “contributions to humanity,” with the French philosopher Michel Serres.
abstract: Leon Wieseltier will share the Dan David Prize, which is given annually to honor “contributions to humanity,” with the French philosopher Michel Serres.

headline.main: New Republic Literary Editor to Split $1 Million Prize
headline.print_headline: A Literary Editor Wins a Big Prize
